Text:
man you've to disabled right click on your imagehost, then how can we save the cover and screenshots in the harddisk? please remove this restriction 

thanks in advance

ekarth22

Just drag the picture to your desktop using the left mouse button. If that doesn't work try a different browser. Works for me in Firefox and Safari.

ekarth22

Just drag the image to your desktop using the Left Mouse Button. Works in Firefox and Safari.
